field.name: entity_table
field.title: Entity Table
field.comment: physical tablename for entity being joined to pledge, e.g. civicrm_contact

field.name: entity_id
field.title: Entity Id
field.comment: FK to entity table specified in entity_table column.

field.name: pledge_frequency_unit
field.title: Pledge Frequency Unit
field.comment: Delimited list of supported frequency units

field.name: is_pledge_interval
field.title: Expose Frequency Interval?
field.comment: Is frequency interval exposed on the contribution form.

field.name: max_reminders
field.title: Maximum Number of Reminders
field.comment: The maximum number of payment reminders to send for any given payment.

field.name: initial_reminder_day
field.title: Initial Reminder Day
field.comment: Send initial reminder this many days prior to the payment due date.

field.name: additional_reminder_day
field.title: Additional Reminder Days
field.comment: Send additional reminder this many days after last one sent, up to maximum number of reminders.

field.name: pledge_start_date
field.title: Pledge Start Date
field.comment: The date the first scheduled pledge occurs.

field.name: is_pledge_start_date_visible
field.title: Show Recurring Donation Start Date?
field.comment: If true - recurring start date is shown.

field.name: is_pledge_start_date_editable
field.title: Allow Edits to Recurring Donation Start Date?
field.comment: If true - recurring start date is editable.
